Title: Jinja support in Prompts
introduction: We have introduced Jinja support in prompts, allowing you to use Jinja templates to create more dynamic prompts. For more details, visit the [Jinja in Prompts](https://docs.keywordsai.co/features/prompt/advanced/jinja-support) page.

New.description: Human annotation is now available for each LLM log. Learn more [here](https://docs.keywordsai.co/features/evaluation/human-evals/human-evals-setup).
Logging for embedding models is now supported. See details [here](https://docs.keywordsai.co/features/monitoring/logging/embedding).

Improved.description: PDF file support has been added. More information [here](https://docs.keywordsai.co/features/generation/upload-pdf).
You can now add an ideal output column to your test sets.

Fixed.description: Resolved image display issues in logs.
Fixed the bug where the model was empty in Compare mode.
